name: Shameless Wordle Clone
description:
A barebones wordle clone I made because I was bored and wanted an option to play it multiple times.

Guess the WORDLE in six guesses. Each guess must be a valid five-letter word. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.

  1. Green means the letter is in the correct place.
  2. Yellow means the letter is present in the word but isn't in the correct place.
  3. Dark Grey means the letter is not present in the word at all.

Controls:

  • Use keyboard for entering letters.
  • Enter to submit.
  • Backspace to delete letters.
  • Escape to clear current guess.
  • The onscreen keyboard can also be used for guessing.

If you try this, feel free to point out any bugs/issues that you find in the game.
